create.title: Request credit facility
create.intro: You can apply for a credit limit to use Invoice Payments. After you are approved, you will have a site-wide credit limit, allowing you to delay payment for the orders that fit into your limit. Requesting a credit limit from us does not affect your credit rating.

tilta.loadingScreenText: This could take a few seconds please donâ€™t close the window.
tilta.terms-of-condition: Invoice Payments are offered in partnership with Varengold Bank. I confirm that I have read and accept the privacy policy of Varengold and Tilta.

messages.unknown-error: An unknown error has occurred. Please try again. If further issues persist, please contact customer service.
messages.no-existing-b2b-address: Before you can request a credit facility with Tilta, you need to create a business billing address first.
messages.address-does-not-exist: The requested address does not exist.
messages.no-country-can-not-be-changed: This country cannot be updated for this billing address, since you have a linked credit limit for Invoice Payments. Please create a new billing address if you need to change the country.

facility.unknown-error: An unknown error occurred while requesting the credit facility. Please contact customer service for assistance.
facility.created-successfully: The credit facility has been created successful.

checkout.facility-exceeded: Your credit limit is currently reached. Please settle any outstanding invoices before placing another order on account. If you have any questions or need assistance, our customer service is here to help.
checkout.facility-too-low: Your credit limit does not currently cover the total of this order. Please review and adjust your order or payment method accordingly. If you have any questions or require assistance, please contact our customer service.

checkout.title: Tilta Invoice
checkout.informationAboutDuration: You have %duration days to pay after your order is shipped. We will send you a reminder when the payment date is close with all important details.

buyerRegistration.intro: For utilizing this payment method, please request a credit availability limit from the payment service provider Tilta Fintech GmbH. Once approved, you can continue with your order.

address.phoneNumberNotice: Please note the correct format of the phone number. It must start with the country code and should not contain any spaces. Example: +491731010101.
